content.raw:
The jenkins coverage build isn't working right now, so I'm doing a coverage build on my machine (see pull request #1047 for details). I'm guessing the `PresetManager` could use a unit test.
~~~
mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=coverage
make
make coverage
firefox coverage/index.html
~~~
content.html:
The jenkins coverage build isn't working right now, so I'm doing a coverage build on my machine (see pull request #1047 for details). I'm guessing the PresetManager could use a unit test.

mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=coverage
make
make coverage
firefox coverage/index.html
